channel.title: Comments on: Someone fucking shot my grenade midair killing me lmao
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: FuriousGoodingSr
item.dc:creator: FuriousGoodingSr
item.description: One of the most amazing things I've ever done is shoot a rocket out of the air. I mean, it was a complete accident, but still.

item.title: By: keksivaras
item.dc:creator: keksivaras
item.description: the same thing happened to me and my squad in Firestorm. luckily my friends didn't see that I killed all of us (:
item.content:encoded: the same thing happened to me and my squad in Firestorm. luckily my friends didn’t see that I killed all of us (:

item.title: By: Spudtron98
item.dc:creator: Spudtron98
item.description: I once shot a guy and got two grenade kills like four seconds later. Made sure to get a recording. Seems that what had happened was that he was holding the grenade button, keeping it on hand before tossing it. Getting shot dead made him drop it, and then it counted as *my* grenade when two guys rounded the corner into it. I'm impressed by *that* detail.
item.content:encoded: I once shot a guy and got two grenade kills like four seconds later. Made sure to get a recording. Seems that what had happened was that he was holding the grenade button, keeping it on hand before tossing it. Getting shot dead made him drop it, and then it counted as *my* grenade when two guys rounded the corner into it. I’m impressed by *that* detail.
